obfuscation: It 's a wonder you would n't stop this machine grinding itself to bits , Mr. Murray .
original:
It's a wonder you wouldn't stop this machine grinding
itself to bits, Mr. Murray.

obfuscation: I was hoping the darn thing would bust .
original: I was hoping the darn thing would bust.

obfuscation: It keeps you from speaking to me .
original:
It keeps you from
talking to me.

obfuscation: That 's the real music .
original: That's the real music.

obfuscation: It 's easy to see you 've become Irish in you .
original: It's easy to see you've got Irish in you.

obfuscation: Do you know what I think ?
original: Do you know what I think?

obfuscation: I think you 're a natural born kidder .
original:
I think you're a
natural born kidder.

obfuscation: All newspaper reporters are like that , I 've heard .
original: All newspaper reporters are like that, I've heard.

obfuscation: You wrong me terribly .
original: You wrong me terribly.

obfuscation: And it isn't charitable to remind me of my job .
original:
And it isn't
charitable to remind me of my job.

obfuscation: I hoped to forget all about it up here .
original:
I hoped to forget all about it up
here.

obfuscation: I think it 's great to be able to write .
original: I think it's great to be able to write.

obfuscation: I wish I could .
original:
I
wish I could.

obfuscation: You ought to be proud of it .
original: You ought to be proud of it.

obfuscation: I 'm not .
original: I'm not.

obfuscation: You ca n't call it writing -- not what I did -- small town material .
original:
You can't call it writing--not what I
did--small town stuff.

obfuscation: But I wanted to ask you something .
original:
But I wanted to ask
you something.

obfuscation: Do you know when I 'm to be moved away to the huts ?
original: Do you know when I'm to be moved away to the huts?

obfuscation: In a few days , I guess .
original: In a few days, I guess.

obfuscation: make n't be impatient .
original: Don't be impatient.

obfuscation: What 's the matter ?
original: What's the matter?

obfuscation: Don't you like us here at the Sanatorium ?
original:
Don't
you like us here at the Sanatorium?

obfuscation: Oh -- you -- yes !
original: Oh--you--yes!

obfuscation: I do n't care for the atmosphere , though .
original:
I don't care for
the atmosphere, though.

obfuscation: All those people in bed out there on the porch seem thus sick .
original:
All those people in bed out there on the
porch seem so sick.

obfuscation: It 's depressing .
original: It's depressing.

obfuscation: I ca n't do anything for them -- and -- it makes me feel thus helpless .
original:
I can't do anything for
them--and--it makes me feel so helpless.

obfuscation: Well , it 's the rules , you know .
original: Well, it's the rules, you know.

obfuscation: All the patients have to come here first until Doctor Stanton finds away whether they 're well enough to be sent out to the huts and cottages .
original:
All the patients have to
come here first until Doctor Stanton finds out whether they're well
enough to be sent out to the huts and cottages.

obfuscation: And remember you 're a patient just like the ones in bed out there -- even if you are up and about .
original:
And remember you're a
patient just like the ones in bed out there--even if you are up and
about.

obfuscation: I know it .
original: I know it.

obfuscation: But I do n't find as I were -- really sick like them .
original: But I don't feel as I were--really sick like them.

obfuscation: None of them do , either .
original: None of them do, either.

obfuscation: Yes , I suppose it's that pipe dream that keeps us all going , eh ?
original:
Yes, I suppose it's
that pipe dream that keeps us all going, eh?

obfuscation: Well , you ought to be thankful .
original: Well, you ought to be thankful.

obfuscation: You 're very lucky , if you knew it .
original:
You're very lucky, if you
knew it.

obfuscation: Shall I tell you a secret ?
original: Shall I tell you a secret?

obfuscation: I 've seen your chart and _you've_ no cause to worry .
original:
I've seen
your chart and _you've_ no cause to worry.

obfuscation: Doctor Stanton joked about it .
original:
Doctor Stanton joked about
it.

obfuscation: He said you were too uninteresting -- there was thus little the matter with you .
original:
He said you were too uninteresting--there was so little the matter
with you.
